title: Sheepskin Throw
description:
Our natural Sheepskin Throw brings textural counterpoint to modern interiors with its soft, downy pile. This sumptuous piece lends itself to being draped over your favorite furniture or used as a rug. Produced by a company with more than 80 years of experience in the industry, it’s refined using a tanning method that retains natural shape and suppleness. Hand-wash or dry-clean. Made in Argentina.
  • 100% sheepskin.
  • Can be used as a throw or rug.
  • Note: Being a natural material, slight variations in color and shape are to be expected and are not defects.
Brand
Design Within Reach
General Dimensions
  • 2" H 24" W 41" D
Product Weight
2 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: HAY Basket
description:
Based in Lausanne, Switzerland, Big-Game was co-founded in 2004 by Grégoire Jeanmonod, Elric Petit and Augustin Scott de Martinville. Drawing on their Swiss, Belgian and French roots, the trio specializes in bringing a relaxed southern European approach to everything they create. Constructed of sturdy plastic, the HAY Basket (2016) can be used for organizing, tidying and laundry storage. It nests for convenient storage when not in use. Made in China.
Brand
HAY
General Dimensions
  • 9¾" H 22¾" W 14¾" D
Product Weight
1.25 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
2-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Hemisphere Table Clock
description:
The Hemisphere Clock (2021) began with an investigation of wall clocks on the market, revealing a homogeneity of designs – mostly flat discs of about the same size. With Hemisphere, designer Henry Julier offers a counterpoint: The clock floats off the wall, a sculptural form that is as dynamic as it is functional. Includes a stand for optional tabletop use. Runs on one AA battery (not included). Made in Taiwan.
  • Graphic and sculptural form.
  • The clock face, held in place with magnets, can be easily removed for battery replacement.
  • A lack of hour marks and easy-to-read hands complement the bold nature of the clock case.
  • Hemisphere received a 2021 Esquire Home Design Award, given to “the 40 coolest items for your home."
  • Includes a stand for optional tabletop use.
  • Runs on one AA battery (not included).
Brand
Design Within Reach
General Dimensions
  • 5" H 5" W 2" D 5" DIA
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Korbo Handmade Wire Basket
description:
Handwoven from a single strand of wire, the Korbo Handmade Wire Basket (1922) holds everything from laundry to tools. The bin (18 liters) has a handle for wall hanging, and the classic baskets (35 and 80 liters) come with two opposing handles. Choose brass wire that will gradually develop a rich patina or acid-proof stainless steel wire that won’t rust or lose its luster with age. Made in Sweden.
  • Sturdy storage baskets and bins.
  • Handcrafted from brass or stainless steel wire.
  • Versatile enough to be used throughout the home.
Brand
Korbo
General Dimensions
  • 14" H 11⅞" DIA
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Sheepskin Pillow
description:
The Sheepskin Pillow brings fine texture and luxurious comfort to your bedroom or living room. It’s made from premium Patagonian sheepskin, which is known for its softness, in a choice of long, furry fibers or shorter, smooth ones. The pillow is stuffed with plush filling and neatly finished with a discreet zipper. Dry-clean only. Made in Argentina.
  • Made of premium sheepskin from Patagonia.
  • Choose from long, furry fibers or shorter, smooth ones.
  • Feather-down filling.
  • Note: Being a natural material, slight variations in color are to be expected and are not defects.

Design Within Reach

title: Mega Dot Blanket
description:
HAY is a Danish design company established in 2002 by Mette and Rolf Hay, who were driven by a desire to create straightforward, functional and beautiful products for daily modern living. Drawing from the best of architecture and fashion, HAY designers specialize in technology, innovation and color. Crafted from premium cotton with polyester filling for exceptional softness and durability, the reversible quilted Mega Dot Blanket (2016) features a textural pattern for subtle graphic expression. Dry-clean only. Made in China.
  • Two-tone, reversible design.
  • Quilted, circular pattern creates a three-dimensional effect.

HAY
